meanings.definition: The act of cutting or sawing with a rip saw.
meanings.sent1: The ripsawing of the wood was loud and rhythmic.
meanings.sent2: I watched the ripsawing of the logs at the lumberyard.
meanings.sent3: The ripsawing of the cake into perfect slices was a satisfying sight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the ripsawing of a saw.
meanings.sent5: The ripsawing of the fabric created a jagged edge.

meanings.definition: To cut or saw with a rip saw.
meanings.sent1: He was ripsawing through the thick branch with determination.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter was ripsawing the plank to the correct size.
meanings.sent3: She ripsawed through the wrapping paper in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to ripsaw through the day, leaving little time for rest.
meanings.sent5: The sound of ripsawing echoed in the workshop.
